en: Moreover the word of Jehovah came unto me, saying,
hmr: Chu nawa khawm, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,

en: And thou, son of man, thus saith the Lord Jehovah unto the land of Israel, An end: the end is come upon the four corners of the land.
hmr: “Nang mihriem naupa, Israel ram kuoma chun Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih; Tâwpna, tâwpna chu ram kil lia inthawkin a hung tlung tah.

en: Now is the end upon thee, and I will send mine anger upon thee, and will judge thee according to thy ways; and I will bring upon thee all thine abominations.
hmr: Tuhin tâwpna chu i kuoma chun a um a, i chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu ka hung tir ding a nih; i um- dânhai ang peiin i chungthu rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai leiin hrem ka ti che.

en: And mine eye shall not spare thee, neither will I have pity; but I will bring thy ways upon thee, and thine abominations shall be in the midst of thee: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Ka mit chun hla naw ni che a, lunginsietna khawm nei naw ning che; nisienlakhawm, i um dânhai leiin hrem ka ti che, i tirdakumna chu nangmaah a um si a; chun, LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng i tih.

en: Thus saith the Lord Jehovah: An evil, an only evil; behold, it cometh.
hmr: “Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Thil ṭha naw, ṭha naw tak meu; en ta a hung a nih.

en: An end is come, the end is come; it awaketh against thee; behold, it cometh.
hmr: Tâwpna a hung tlung a, tâwpna chu a hung tlung tah; i chunga chun a hung tho a, ngai ta, a hung a nih.

en: Thy doom is come unto thee, O inhabitant of the land: the time is come, the day is near, a day of tumult, and not of joyful shouting, upon the mountains.
hmr: Aw ram hluotu, i chungrikna chu a hung tlung tah; a hun chu a hung tlung a, a ni chu a hnai tah, tlâng chunghaia hlimna khêk rihai ni loin, buoina ni chu.

en: Now will I shortly pour out my wrath upon thee, and accomplish mine anger against thee, and will judge thee according to thy ways; and I will bring upon thee all thine abominations.
hmr: Tuhin sâwt nawteah ka lung- insenna chu i chungah hung bun- thlâng ka ta, i chunga ka lunginsenna chu sukpuitling ka tih; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah ro rêl ka ta, i tirdakumnahai po po leiin hrem ka ti che.

en: And mine eye shall not spare, neither will I have pity: I will bring upon thee according to thy ways; and thine abominations shall be in the midst of thee; and ye shall know that I, Jehovah, do smite.
hmr: Ka mit chun hla naw ni, lunginsietna nei bawk naw ning; i um dânhai ang peiin i chungah hung intlungtir ka ta; i tirdakumnahai chu nangmaah a um si a; chun, kei LALPA hin ka hrem che a nih ti hre tâng i tih.

en: Behold, the day, behold, it cometh: thy doom is gone forth; the rod hath blossomed, pride hath budded.
hmr: Ngai ta, ni chu, ngai ta, a hung tlung; i chungrikna chu a fe suok tah a, hmawl chu ân dâwn a, chapona chu a kumûm tah.

en: Violence is risen up into a rod of wickedness; none of them shall remain, nor of their multitude, nor of their wealth: neither shall there be eminency among them.
hmr: Thawluinaa inthawkin rîtlona hmawl a hung suok a, a tu el khawm um sawng thei naw nih a, an mipuihai khawm, an hausaknahai khawm; anni lai chun a ṭhabik ti khawm um naw nih.

en: The time is come, the day draweth near: let not the buyer rejoice, nor the seller mourn; for wrath is upon all the multitude thereof.
hmr: A hun chu a hung tlung a, a ni chu a hung hnai tah; inchawtu chu hlim naw sienla, a zawrtu khawma pawiti bawk naw raw se; mi po po chungah lunginsenna chu a um si a.

en: For the seller shall not return to that which is sold, although they be yet alive: for the vision is touching the whole multitude thereof, none shall return; neither shall any strengthen himself in the iniquity of his life.
hmr: An dam zing sûng chun, a zawrtu chu zawra um tah kuoma chun a kîr nâwk âwm si nawh a; hi thilhmulâwk hin mipui po po a huom vawng a; tukhawm kir nâwk naw ni a, tukhawm ama suolnaa chun dam muolsuo naw nih.

en: They have blown the trumpet, and have made all ready; but none goeth to the battle; for my wrath is upon all the multitude thereof.
hmr: Tawtawrâwt chu an mût tah a, mi po po chu an inringtir vawng tah a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm indonaa chun an fe nawh a; ka lunginsenna chu mipui po po chunga chun a um sih a.

en: The sword is without, and the pestilence and the famine within: he that is in the field shall die with the sword; and he that is in the city, famine and pestilence shall devour him.
hmr: “Kâwlhnâm chu puotieng a um a, ṭâmna le hripui chu sungtienga chun a um a; loa um chu kâwlhnâmah thîng a ta, khawpui sûnga um chu hripui le ṭâmna chun fa zo a tih.

en: But those of them that escape shall escape, and shall be on the mountains like doves of the valleys, all of them moaning, every one in his iniquity.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, chutaka lo suokthleng chu suokthleng an ta, vaṭhu angin tlângahai chun um an ta, an rêng el chun sûn an tih, mi tinin mâni suolna seng chu.

en: All hands shall be feeble, and all knees shall be weak as water.
hmr: Kuthai po po chu hrât loin um an ta, khûphai po po chu tui anga zawiin um an tih.

en: They shall also gird themselves with sackcloth, and horror shall cover them; and shame shall be upon all faces, and baldness upon all their heads.
hmr: Saiip puonhaiin inchei an ta, ṭitnain anni chu inkhum a tih; an hmaihai chunga chun inzakna um a ta, an luhai po po chunga chun lu- kâwkna um a tih.

en: They shall cast their silver in the streets, and their gold shall be as an unclean thing; their silver and their gold shall not be able to deliver them in the day of the wrath of Jehovah: they shall not satisfy their souls, neither fill their bowels; because it hath been the stumblingblock of their iniquity.
hmr: An tangkahai chu kawtthlêr- haia chun dehâwn an ta, an râng- kachakhai khawm chu thil thieng naw ang hung nîng a tih; an tangka le rângkachak chun LALPA lungin- senna nia chun anni chu sansuok naw nih a; an lungril chu suktlaiin, an phîng khawm chu sukkhawp bawk naw ni hai, an suolnaa tlûkna lung a ni tâk leiin.

en: As for the beauty of his ornament, he set it in majesty; but they made the images of their abominations and their detestable things therein: therefore have I made it unto them as an unclean thing.
hmr: An incheina mawina chu inlal- saknân an hmang a; nisienlakhawm, an tirdakumna limhai chu an siemin, an pawrchena thilhai limhai le chun; chuleiin, an ta ding chun thil thieng- nawah ka siem tah a nih.

en: And I will give it into the hands of the strangers for a prey, and to the wicked of the earth for a spoil; and they shall profane it.
hmr: Man dingin ramdang mihai kut- ah pêng ka ta, mi rilohai kuomah râllâk dingin; chuongchun, sukpawr- chêng an tih.

en: My face will I turn also from them, and they shall profane my secret place; and robbers shall enter into it, and profane it.
hmr: Ka hmai chu an kuoma in- thawkin la hmang ka ta, ka hmun inthieng chu sukpawrchêng an tih; inru hmanghai chu a sûngah lût an ta, sukpawrchêng an tih;

en: Make the chain; for the land is full of bloody crimes, and the city is full of violence.
hmr: Khaidiet chu siem rawh; ram chu thisen insuo thusiein a sip a, khawpui sûng chu inpâwngnêknain a sip sih a.

en: Wherefore I will bring the worst of the nations, and they shall possess their houses: I will also make the pride of the strong to cease; and their holy places shall be profaned.
hmr: Chuleichun, awi naw mi ṭha nawtakhai chu hung ṭhuoi ka ta, an inhai chu neipêk an tih; mi hrâthai chapona chu suktâwp bawk ka ta; chun, an hmun inthienghai chu sukpawrche nîng an tih.

en: Destruction cometh; and they shall seek peace, and there shall be none.
hmr: Bohmangna chu a hung tlung mêk a, inremna chu zawng an tih; anachu um naw ni.

en: Mischief shall come upon mischief, and rumor shall be upon rumor; and they shall seek a vision of the prophet; but the law shall perish from the priest, and counsel from the elders.
hmr: Sietna chunga siet nâwk zuolna hung tlung a ta, thuthang chunga chun thuthang um a ta; chun, zâwlnei thilhmulâwkhai chu zawng an ta, nisienlakhawm, thiempua inthawkin dân le, mi hluihaia inthawkin thu- râwn chu bohmang tâng a tih.

en: The king shall mourn, and the prince shall be clothed with desolation, and the hands of the people of the land shall be troubled: I will do unto them after their way, and according to their deserts will I judge them; and they shall know that I am Jehovah.
hmr: Lal chu lusûnin um a ta, hotu khawm chu beidawngnain inthuom a tih; chun, rama mipuihai kuthai chu sukbuoi nîng a ta; an um dânhai ang peiin an chungah thâwng ka tih; chun, an ngaithana ang peiin rorêl- pêk ka ta; chun, LALPA ka ni ti mi hre tâng an tih,” tiin.
